summary: Provides a preprocessing pipeline for the English Google Text Normalization dataset, applying transformations such as digit‑by‑digit verbalization of long numbers and fraction denominators, removal of non‑English characters, standardization of fraction symbols, simplification of spoken URL tokens, and preservation of certain class types, to produce cleaner training splits for downstream normalization models.
business_intent: Improve the quality and robustness of training data for speech/text normalization systems, enabling more accurate and stable model learning.
